(member_id = #{memberId} OR (approval_first_id = #{memberId}) OR (approval_second_id = #{memberId}) OR (approval_third_id = #{memberId}))

SELECT a.approval_no AS approvalNo, a.member_id AS memberId, m.member_name AS memberName, a.approval_title AS approvalTitle, a.approval_content AS approvalContent, a.approval_form AS approvalForm, a.approval_now_status AS approvalNowStatus, a.approval_first_id AS approvalFirstId, m_first.member_name AS approvalFirstName, a.approval_first_comment AS approvalFirstComment, a.approval_first_id AS approvalSecondId, m_second.member_name AS approvalSecondName, a.approval_second_comment AS approvalSecondComment, a.approval_third_id AS approvalThirdId, m_third.member_name AS approvalThirdName, a.approval_third_comment AS approvalThirdComment, a.approval_last_number AS approvalLastNumber, a.approval_last_status AS approvalLastStatus, a.createdate, a.updatedate FROM approval a JOIN member m ON a.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN member m_first ON a.approval_first_id = m_first.member_id LEFT JOIN member m_second ON a.approval_second_id = m_second.member_id LEFT JOIN member m_third ON a.approval_third_id = m_third.member_id WHERE a.approval_no = #{approvalNo}
